about_the_game:
In this prequel to to Abeyance, you are the leader of one of the factions trying to reconstruct the economy of the galaxy, after the end of the war.
You must build and manage your colony's economic and military resources carefully, while watching out for rival factions who are also vying for supremacy.



The first RTS game in the Abeyance franchise. Collect resources, recruit your troops, fight against and alongside other players.
Set during the aftermath of the war, you are taking part in rebuilding the infrastructure of the planets, while trying to establish your dominion.

name: Recovery Syndicate

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.5 GHz / AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050 / AMD RX550
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 2.8GHz / AMD Ryzen 7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 1080 / AMD 6600
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
